1. U.S. to roll out ‘Cyber Trust Mark’ label on secure devices  NBC News

  4. US govt launches cybersecurity safety label for smart devices  BleepingComputer
  5. Consumer products to get 'Cyber Trust' marks in 2025, White House says  The Record from Recorded Future News
